Package com.skayani.brickbreaker.states

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GameOverState
    GameOverState that is instantiated when the ball is out of bounds (lose) or if the user breaks all bricks in the game (win).
    GameStateManager
    GameStateManager class that stores the different game states in a stack data structure.
    LevelSelectState
    LevelSelectState that is instantiated when the user clicks "New Game" from the MenuState.
    MenuState
    MenuState class that is instatiated when the game is first launched.
    PlayState
    PlayState class that is instantiated when user presses a level from LevelSelectState
    PreferencesState
    PreferencesState (extending upon abstract State class) for allowing user to adjust game settings.
    State
    Abstract State class for the various game states: PlayState, MenuState, etc.
